text:
A short-term skill training for women and youth in knitting and sewing would be conducted in the district. The selection for the training programme will be held from January 25 to 29 here. Candidates must have a basic education qualification of Class VIII. The applicants may be over 18 years of age and under 40 years of age.

The training will be held for one month from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. Basic fee is Rs.100. Interested persons may attend the interview at the Government ITI in Hosur on the aforementioned dates, at 10 a.m.
title: Skill training programme
